description: Blockchain with citizen’s card as one integrated service to all
Scenario: Mr. Liu often requires various services from different sections within the government, and is seeking a way to integrate relevant information into one source for the sake of efficiency and convenience.
pain_points_and_needs: •	City government hopes to include payment functions in citizen’s cards

•	
Info and bonus points issued by different sections of the government should be integrated.
smart_solution: This solution enables the public to use an App integrated with citizen’s card to query, and pay relevant fees (such as parking fees and fines). The citizen’s card can also serve as a form of payment through App or QR code. In addition,
adopted_technology: Blockchain Technology, QR Code, Electronic Ticketing
solution_description: This solution utilizes Blockchain and citizen’s card for integrated services. It documents a citizen’s past history with applications, welfares, and more. Citizen’s card can then be used for mobile payment, taking public transportation, as well as paying registration fees and fines.
